title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“...the situation is likely to deteriorate if nothing is done quickly.” [From an article by Kirk Makin, The Globe and Mail, Winnipeg, 11 November 1987. Submitted by Charles C. Bigelow, Winnipeg.]
